body:
When installing the *header-only* lib ISAAC ~~, which adds `cuda` only as a dependency to trigger it properly for further packages, *without* cuda as `spack install isaac~cuda`~~ it fails on dev as of 4553b14 with:

```

==> Executing phase : 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:

/home/huebl/src/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/cmake.py:149, in cmake:
     144      def cmake(self, spec, prefix):
     145          """Runs ``cmake`` in the build directory"""

     147              self.cmake_args()

  >> 149              inspect.getmodule(self).cmake(*options)

# log:
==> 'cmake' 'lib' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/isaac-1.3.0-jzcorqen6kzdxtmadagngp4c427ezl73' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=RelWithDebInfo' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=FALSE' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/isaac-1.3.0-jzcorqen6kzdxtmadagngp4c427ezl73/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/isaac-1.3.0-jzcorqen6kzdxtmadagngp4c427ezl73/lib64:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/boost-1.63.0-bmtnfubo2dxn3guljshax3m4e2u3lglo/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/bzip2-1.0.6-syidqu3x4z355sx5af5ny7okyuhed53q/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/zlib-1.2.11-q4s2ymg5cupvjutwgdkiklljvsyfhrpf/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/icet-2.1.1-4qdinyo3wuas27azfuhxec6ypmdhv3i2/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/openmpi-2.1.1-472ow5qjauqtelugdtre6mzqw4sz6dhq/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/hwloc-1.11.7-2dmlsfml3ll6tqrhuysm2sz4kvaktutf/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/libpciaccess-0.13.4-a6t5336vlegdoaly3qq6opmlmd6zbhzz/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/libxml2-2.9.4-qhrsnhlkmv2d26xnmz777fsliwqepbd5/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/xz-5.2.3-x5bmsfrloulpquxn23qh25uvmvnpbovy/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/jansson-2.9-sy2abdelpa5bauao5fimruuta6js5uss/lib:/home/huebl/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.9.4/libjpeg-turbo-1.5.0-p5tj52s2ouwl5ajv4ed5krd6rg7bebyz/lib'
CMake Error: The source directory "/tmp/huebl/spack-stage/spack-stage-Mm6zef/isaac-1.3.0/spack-build/lib" does not exist.
```

Is this an error in our cmake install of `ISAAC` or in spack's `build_systems/cmake.py`?
As a header-only lib, we don't create a `lib/` on install and only copy `include/`s.

**update:** also happens with CUDA as of `spack install isaac` with the same error.
title: Error installing ISAAC (Header-Only, CMake)
